original_text:
Many times he delivered them,
    but they were rebellious in their purposes
    and were brought low through their iniquity.
korean_text: 여호와께서 여러 번 그들을 건지시나 그들은 교묘하게 거역하며 자기 죄악으로 말미암아 낮아짐을 당하였도다

sentences.original_text: but they were rebellious in their purposes
and were brought low through their iniquity.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 자기들의 죄악 때문에 낮아졌습니다.
